data.title: St. Louis Blues Hockey Information Resources
data.meta_description: Lets Go Blues - St. Louis Blues Hockey Podcast and Discussion Forum Since 2001.
data.text:
Stats, Numbers & Resources

NHL.com Stats

Newly restructured with lots of stats.

Hockey-Reference.com

Great resource for past season standings, rosters, box scores, playoffs, etc.

Cap Friendly

Player & team salaries, salary cap info, etc.

Hockey DB

Past & present team and player stats and info.

NHL Rulebook

From nhl.com

GearGeek.com

A database of the brand and types of equipment worn by each player.

Media

'16-'17 St. Louis Blues Media Guide (.pdf)

All kinds of good stuff in here.

Jim Thomas

Lead Blues beat writer for the St. Louis Post Dispatch

Jeremy Rutherford

Jeremy Rutherford is the Blues reporter for The Athletic St. Louis. Jeremy is in his 14th season covering the team, after spending a dozen years as the clubâ€™s beat writer for the St. Louis Post-Dispatch.

Lou Korac

Lou has covered the St. Louis Blues since 1997 and has written for various publications, currently for NHL.com since 2012.

St. Louis Post-Dispatch

The hometown newspaper.

Belleville News-Democrat

Across the river, Belleville's coverage of the Blues.

Official Sites

St. Louis Blues Official Site

St. Louis Blues Twitter Page

St. Louis Blues Facebook Page

The National Hockey League

St. Louis Blues History

Blues Wikipedia Page

Lots of good history info.

Year by Year Historical St. Louis Blues Moments

A very brief writeup of every Blues season.

Blues Uniform/Jersey History

Every jersey the Blues have ever worn.

The Rise & Fall of the Solomons: Part 1 | Part 2 | Part 3

An excellent write-up by St. Louis Game Time on the original owners of the St. Louis Blues.

Blues Logo History

A nice look at all of the logos & patches associated with the St. Louis Blues.

Player Drawings from 1967

Very nice drawings from official promotinal materials with blurbs of fun info about the players.

The Monday Night Miracle

One of the greatest games in Blues history.

The Greatest 3rd Period Comeback in NHL History

Nov. 29, 2000 - Toronto - The Blues score 5 unanswered goals in the last 15 minutes of the 3rd period and score again in OT against Curtis Joseph & the Toronto Maple Leafs.
